rule.description: Kwomaroñ deloñ ilo right-click menu eo ilo jabdrewot web page Ñe kwoj deloñ jen juon web page, URL eo an web page eo enaj kobaiktok einwot juon rule ilo default. .

url.title: URL mode, complete URL.
url.explain: Wāween in emaron in jejjet ñan URL eo eweeppān.

glob.title: Wãwen glob ej kajerbal {{1}} library eo Jouj im lale ñan kajerbale, ak kwomaroñ bukõt kin kajerbale {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, eo ej errā ippān YouTube homepage eo im aolep subpage ko.

regexp.title: Regular expression, jouj im lale See ñan kōjerbale.
